content: Add a splash brilliance to the humdrum decor of your bathroom with a roll of colored toilet paper. This 3-ply roll of T.P. is 100% biodegradable and caresses your nether regions with utmost care while captivating your eyes with its vibrant hues.

Put a bold emphasis on any document by highlighting sections using the “get the hint” sticky notes. Using these profane notes, it’ll be impossible for anyone to miss the urgent matter at hand with the brightly colored pointer arrows leading the way.

Don’t let the terrorists win. Support the undisputed greatest nation ever like a true red-blooded ‘Murican with the American bald eagle shirt. This comfy cotton tee features a modern fit and comes emblazoned with an over-sized graphic of our nation’s majestic bird.

titleEN: You Have To Fucking Eat Book
content: Help keep your sanity as you struggle to get your offspring to eat their food by reading “You Have To Fucking Eat” as you wait for them to finish. Filled with profane and brutally honest  and hilarious entries, it’s just the thing you need to make mealtime bearable.

Ensure your pooch stays healthy and fit with the canine treadmill. This durable and portable treadmill can be set to various intensity levels designed to simulate outdoor terrain and increase endurance and strength for the ultimate cardiovascular training session.

Keep a close eye on your valuables while travelling with the luggage tracking monitor. Once placed inside the desired bag, it allows you to use your phone to keep tabs on it’s location once the plane lands so you have one less thing to worry about while abroad.

Determine which of your friends is the weakest link as you try and knock each other off the rocking inflatable float. Once this rugged and sizable float is inflated, friendship and allegiance go out the window as you try to send the others to their watery grave.

Add a touch of class to doing the dishes by storing your sponge in the Mr. Sponge holder. When the sponge isn’t in use, it conveniently hangs high and dry on the collar of Mr. Sponge, creating the illusion that he’s sporting a fashionable bow tie.

Show off your Springfield pride as you do your part for the environment by using the Kwik-E-Mart reusable bag for all your shopping needs. The bag is sturdy enough to handle the weight of your weekly supply of Duff beer, donuts, and hotdogs dangerously past their expiration.

Avoid first degree burns when using your laptop for hours on end by keeping your skin cool with the laptop feet stand. Simply attach one foot stand at each end of the laptop and it will keep the bottom ever from making direct contact with your skin/killing your sperm count.

Discover a whole new meaning to “comfort food” when you experience the utter bliss of sitting in a pizza beanbag. This ultra comfy slice of heavenly pie comes topped off with a generous serving of cheese and pepperoni that’ll make your mouth water.

Give your home bar the look and feel of a fancy watering hole by serving your drinks with the rack and pour liquor dispensers. Perfect for bars that are tight on space, it allows you to store bottles in a manner that keeps them handy and ready to serve at all times.

Create a magical environment in your young sprout’s bedroom with the mushroom moonlight.  This small spore comes outfitted with a multicolored dome top filled with small flowers and butterflies that help create a delightful and vibrant light show.

titleEN: Knitted Crochet Turtle Beanie and Shell
content: Get your newborn into the Halloween spirit by dressing them up in the adorable knitted crochet turtle beanie and shell. This colorful ensemble outfits your baby with a cozy knitted beanie and turtle shell that keeps them warm while strolling the streets for treats.

Receive a grueling full body workout without placing too much stress on your bones and joints with the aquatic treadmill. This compact machine allows you to perform your cardio workout in the middle of your pool so you stay cool and energized while you exercise.

Protect your coveted tablet with dark sorcery by encasing it in the Necronomicon tablet cover. Inspired by Lovecraft’s fictional grimoire, this custom made case features a high quality faux leather cover complete with side latches for added protection.

The ping pong ball won’t be the only thing all wet and slippery the next time you play a rousing game with the inflatable beer pong game. This customized pool float measures 72 inches long and comes with 22 cup holders that are recessed for extra stability.

Arm yourself for battle with the downrange tactical tomahawk and live to see another day in the post-apocalyptic world. The incredibly versatile design provides you with an array of useful tools such as a hammer, axe, and pry bar in a lightweight package.

Transform your furry friend into the prehistoric pet of your dreams with the Stegosaurus dog costume. Ideal for small to medium canines, this costume covers them from head to paw in a detailed dino suit complete with spinal plates and spiky tail.

Turn a run-of-the-mill night into an epic drinking bender with help from the the Drinking Games book. Within its enlightening pages you’ll find 25 of the craziest and most entertaining drinking games known to mankind – you’ll end up completely blitzed before the night is over.

Drastically elevate your photography skills by using the movable camera dolly to get the professionally looking shots you want. The dolly’s modular tripod design allows you to mount the camera on to a stable yet flexible medium to achieve the perfect shot.

Let’s face it – you’re an idiot. Luckily with the idiot proof iPhone case your phone won’t have to suffer on behalf of your incompetence. This rugged case encapsulates your phone in a tough waterproof exterior that protects it while still allowing you to easily access its features.

Embark on an eye opening journey through our world’s vast oceans within the pages of the Man and Sea book. This compelling book takes you on a tour of the seven seas through page after page of visually stunning aerial and underwater photographs.

Get your four legged family member in on the fun this Halloween season by dressing him up in the Star Wars Ewok dog costume. This adorable costume transforms your small breed pooch into your very own lovable tiny Ewok.

titleEN: Seinfeld Kramer’s Ass Man License Plate
content: Let the world know the ASSMAN is back in town when you stroll down the streets with Kramer’s Ass Man license plate on your ’73 Implala. You’ll turn heads and get laughs wherever you go with this classic Seinfeld prop on your car’s bumper.

Get your fill of the countless hors d’oeuvres being served with help from the finger food plates. The practical design allows you to wear the small plate like a ring so you have a convenient resting place for food while your hand remains free to hold your drink.

Ensure your kicks stay looking as fresh as the day they came out of the sweatshop with the sneaker cleaning kit. The specially formulated solution is completely biodegradable and contains no harsh chemicals so it won’t cause damage to your shoes.

Get in the spirit of Halloween without loosing your stylish edge with this incredibly fashionable pumpkin suit. This designer piece features a modern streamlined look and comes dotted with dozens of brightly colored Jack-O-lanterns for extra flair.

Help take the edge off after a stressful day by chilling your drink with the whiskey wedge. The wedge’s stylish shape gives your drink an aesthetically pleasing look while its large size melts slower than smaller ice cubes to help retain your drink’s full flavor.

Jump on the latest digital bandwagon and throw your money away on the Sony Android smart watch. This Android version of the smart watch is water resistant and features innovative touchscreen technology to facilitate easier navigation.

Work on your balancing skills from the comfort of home with the backyard slackline. Once the slackline is fastened at both ends, you’ll have a rigid yet flexible rope that will allow you to perform tricks or just work on your balance.

Make teatime an occasion to remember when you prepare herbal beverages using the teabagging tea bag. Virtually nothing else accompanies those delectable crumpets better than a good old fashioned teabagging – just like dad used to make.

Get on the fast track to healthy eating by employing the services of the smart food scale. With this app and scale combo you’ll be able to see the carbs, proteins, calories, and micronutrients in all of your meals so you can create the perfect balanced diet.

See the world through your pup’s eyes by gearing him up with the GoPro dog harness and letting him loose. This customized harness comfortably straps on to your furry friend while allowing you to mount multiple GoPros so you can capture several different angles.

Give the bachelor pad a warrior’s touch by accessorizing with the ninja star coat hook. The star easily screws into the wall and provides a sturdy and convenient place to hang your coat while transforming the wall into a scene out of a Shanghai showdown.

titleEN: Star Wars Princess Leia Dog Costume
content: Get your pup in the spirit of Halloween when you dress her up in Star Wars Princess Leia dog costume. This out of this world ensemble features Leia’s signature garb and iconic hair buns that transform your four legged friend into one sexy space bitch.

Command control of your very own rover with the app controlled robot. This little fella sports a tough compact body and can be controlled with your smartphone so you can easily maneuver it as it performs all sorts of tricks while zooming around.

Learn how to become a masterful barman from the comfort of home with the help of The Bartender’s Cocktail book. The book shows thirsty individuals how to skillfully prepare all PDT’s  300+ signature cocktails such as the bacon infused bourbon.

Create a soothing atmosphere the next time you bathe with the water droplet bath light. This giant water drop floats and bobs around the bathtub while emanating a soft blue light designed to help you relax and melt your stress away.

Kick back and relax in total comfort the next time you venture into the wild by bringing along the hanging nest. This portable cocoon hangs from branches and creates a cozy protective environment ideal for resting inside of while enjoying the view of Mother Nature.

Strike fear in the heart of the enemy when you show up to do battle armed with the scorpion blade. The weapon stretches 14.5 inches overall and comes stocked with a slew of blades along the sides in addition to a deadly curved stinger blade.

Keep your favorite hooch cool for long periods of time by topping it off with the colossal ice cube molds. The molds allow you to make ginormous 2.5 inch cubes that melt slower so they won’t dilute your drink as much as quickly as smaller ice cubes.

Help keep Jaws far away from you the next time you go swimming in his backyard by using the shark deterrent spray. This possible life-saver has been designed by world renowned scientists to deter sharks from approaching you.

Get yourself on the fast track to obesity by molding your diet around the Nutella recipe book. Here you’ll learn how to apply this tasty condiment in dozens of different ways so that no matter what you’re in the mood for, you’ll find the ideal mouth-watering treat.

Learn everything you have ever wanted to know about the nectar of the gods by reading The Beer Book. This insanely informative and entertaining read guides you through the marvelous world of beer by examining every aspect of this delicious liquid.

titleEN: Game Of Thrones Dragon Eggs Set
content: Feel as proud as the Mother of Dragons when you take home the Game Of Thrones dragon eggs set. These resin eggs feature intricate detailing to achieve an authentic look and come encased in an elegant wooden box lined with silk for maximum protection.

Keep cash and other valuables from getting stolen while you bathe in the water by storing them inside the sunscreen bottle safe. With your belongings safely concealed inside, passersby will be fooled into thinking it’s just a simple bottle of sunscreen.

Thanks to the water bottle ice mold you’ll be able to keep your H2O icy cold without having to struggle jamming in pieces of shattered ice cubes. The mold makes long cylindrical ice cubes designed to easily slide into the mouth of plastic water bottles.

Ensure your phone is always at hand when you need it by keeping it in the car vent phone mount. This handy pocket sized accessory latches on to the car’s air conditioning vents so that you can use your phone without having to hold it in your hand.

Slither your way into first place for best costume with the outrageously funny Ghostbusters Slimer mask. The mask gives off the appearance your head has been transformed into the body of this pudgy, disgusting, yet undeniably lovable ghost.

Help your home maintain an elegant and minimalistic appearance by plugging in your appliances to the invisible power strip.  The power strip contains six outlets and features a wood colored facade designed to blend perfectly with your hardwood floors.

Learn everything there is to know about America’s favorite animated family with The Simpsons Family History book. You’ll be taken on a trip through their comedic past to reveal all the events that transformed them into longest running prime time animated show.

Keep your footsies warm and comfy on a cold winters day with the narwhal heated slippers. These impossible cute slippers come shaped like two friendly narwhals and heat up when plugged into a USB outlet so your feet stay warm as you relax.

Start your very own zombie apocalypse as you rampage the streets of your town wearing the Walking Dead zombie latex mask. This professional grade mask gives you the decrepit look of a zombie without that pesky rotting flesh smell.

Keep from becoming roadkill on your next nighttime ride with the LED bike lights. These all weather lights fit discretely on the bottom of the bike frame and emit a luminous glow that oncoming cars will be able to see from a distance.

Teach your offspring the joys of photography from an early age with the LEGO digital camera. This unique 3 mega pixel camera holds up to 80 photos, comes with a built in flash and features a vibrant LEGO brick frame designed to make photography fun for everyone.

Parade your sexy animosity for pants by walking with your bum exposed wearing the no pants shirt. The slogan on the front of this comfortable, loose-fitting t-shirt perfectly relates the unmatched feeling of freedom you feel the moment you drop your trousers.

“Stand back – I’m about to perform science!” is what you’ll be screaming to others as you go to work creating sensational drinks with the chemistry shot glasses. Shaped like common chemistry beakers, they’re ideal for accurately concocting the perfect drink.

Take your selfies to a new dimension – the 3rd dimension – by framing them in the selfies photo album. This novelty album lets you showcase your  32 best selfies and features a creative cover with a mirror on the phone screen ideal for self adoration.

titleEN: Star Wars R2-D2 Projection Alarm Clock
content: When you have to wake on time for an important event, the Star Wars R2-D2 projection alarm is your only hope. This pint-sized R2-D2 is the alarm droid you’re looking for, it projects the time onto the wall just like a hologram message so you can see the time with ease.

Ensure your feet receive a good cleaning during bath time with the shower sandal footscrubber. This one size fits most sandal gently massages your feet as the soft bristles on the bottom allow you to give your feet a good scrubbing without you having to bend down.

Enjoy the glow a full moon every night with the 3D moon night light. The unique design of this night light gives off a soothing atmosphere and creates a 3 dimensional effect that allows you to see the entire surface of the moon in perfect detail.

Fall in love day after day with the Underwater Puppies Photography book. As far as coffee table books go, this amusing hardcover contains page after page of impossibly cute puppies swimming underwater that’ll brighten up anyone’s day and make them go awww.

Avoid getting jabbed in the thighs with your keys by keeping them in the compact key holder. Unlike conventional keychains, this design allows your keys to be stored vertically within the holder so they stay organized and won’t create an unsightly bulge.

Take your selfie game to professional levels by using the smartphone selfie stick. This accessory fits most smartphones and can extend to different lengths and features an adjustable ball head so you can customize the angle for the perfect narcissistic shot.

Go medieval on your classmates during the next paper fight by bombarding them using the Leonardo da Vinci catapult kit. This easy to assemble model comes with everything you’ll need to build a fully functional medieval styled catapult – huzzah!

Relive the glorious decade that brought us dial-up internet and cinematic masterpieces like Clueless with the 1990s coloring book. Every page comes jam packed with iconic pictures of all the phat movies, shows and products that made the ’90s so rad.

Stay hydrated while on the go by sporting the always fashionable drink straw helmet. Equipped with two equally balanced can holders and a long plastic straw, it’s the ultimate way to get absurdly inebriated at sporting events and other outdoor functions.

Keep your personal belongings safe while working out by wearing the exercise storage belt. This fashionable and comfortable accessory is available in virtually any color you like and features a series of pockets to store your stuff in while getting your workout on.

Record an impromptu jam session as it happens without having to venture into the studio with the Gibson memory cable.  The cable boasts a battery life of up to 8 hours and is capable of storing an incredible 13 hours of audio.

Who says being kidnapped and bound by duct tape has to be an unpleasant experience? With the invigorating aroma provided from the scented duct tape you’ll be so enthralled by each of the savory scents that you’ll hope your ransom never gets paid.

Freak out friends and family by infesting their homes with the remote control tarantula spider. This radioactive sized tarantula  measures a whopping six inches long and features “awesome-crawling-action” so you can unleash terror in any household.

Cuddle up with your very own minion after a long day by laying atop the ultra comfortable Despicable Me minions sleeping bag. This giant minion comes dressed in his signature garbs and is filled with an extremely soft padding for the ultimate level of comfort.

Let your stress sizzle away as you plop your buns down on the hamburger beanbag. This colossal burger comes topped with a juicy patty, cheese, onions, tomatoes, and lettuce that all combine to provide a deliciously comfortable seat.

The arrival of new troops can be littered with potential danger, luckily the Fatherhood Training Manual is here to help you avoid them. Its pages are designed to aid newly appointed commanding officers with the know how they’ll need to help their troops survive childhood.

Create a life saving fire when you need it most by relying on the all weather firestarter to get a spark going. This essential survival tool features a spring loaded flint that works in all kinds of weather conditions and can be operated using only one hand.

Look fresh to death as you walk up to the club hoping not to get noticed wearing the Thrift Shop social anxiety shirt. This shirt parodies Macklemore’s well-known lyrics to convey the sentiment socially anxious people feel when out on the town.

Take out your discomfort with style and efficiency by enlisting the services of the Pulp Fiction pillows. With Mr. Vincent Vega and Mr. Jules Winnfield on the job, their plush and soft bodies provide utmost comfort as you binge watch TV all weekend long.

Keep your drains from getting clogged by a revolting accumulation of wet hair with the disposable hair traps. Simply place it over the the drain before showering and it’ll trap all those loose hairs while allowing the water to flow down the drain.

Start your own edible Jurassic Park by bringing the dinos back from extinction with these dinosaur cake molds. The molds lets you create small 3D dinosaurs that can be garnished with any toppings you desire to create delicious and professional looking snacks.

Show the office memos no mercy as you impale them with the weapon push pins. These novelty push pins come designed like miniature versions of deadly weapons and work great for pinning documents and bringing some barbaric levity to the work place.

Put your downtime at work to good use by sharpening your table tennis skills on the ping pong conference table. Capable of transforming in minutes, It’s the ultimate office furniture for companies that believe in working hard and playing harder.

Turn lunchtime into playtime when you serve up a tasty meal with help from the Tetris sandwich molds. By simply placing the mold over the bread and pressing down, it cuts the sandwich into differently shaped Tetris pieces you can actually play with.

Add a playful touch to your laptop by saving important documents using the LEGO USB drive. The USB drive is compatible with both Mac and PCs, comes in various vibrant colors, and features a transfer rate of up to 480 megabits per second.

Keep a cool head as you work hard concocting alcoholic delights with help from the glass skull ice bucket. This realistically shaped skull bucket is made from thick crystal clear glass and comes with two short handles on each side for easy lifting.

What better way to lounge around the house on a lazy day than with the Homer Simpson slippers. Once your feet slip into Homer’s mouth you’ll feel like you’re walking on clouds of fluffy donuts that’ll melt away all your worries so you can veg out in peace.

Accomplish the Herculean task of bringing in the groceries in one trip by using the multiple grocery bag carrier. The handles provide a comfortable grip and come equipped with sturdy hooks that exponentially increase the number of bags you can carry.

Take your yoga workout to new heights when you begin practicing on the aerial yoga hammock. Once safely anchored, the hammock suspends you mid air and features foot stirrups so that you can perform gravity-defying moves in glorious ass hugging yoga pants.

Stop smelling your man's dick at five in the morn – go the professional route by interrogating him with help from the hand shocking lie detector. Only the truth will set your baby daddy free and keep him from getting shocked should he decide to answer dishonestly.

Send covert messages without them being intercepted by prying eyes by writing them using the invisible ink pen. The specialized ink is designed to work on various surfaces like wood, plastic, or even glass – and only becomes visible when placed under a black light.

titleEN: Three Way Slip And Slide Racer
content: Become the ultimate slip and slider in town by defeating your friends in an all out race on the three way slip and slide. Three lanes are placed side by side so you and two buddies can go head to head by gliding through the wet and slippery surface.

Bathe under a delightful cornucopia of color with the rainbow LED shower head. Once the water starts flowing, the shower head comes alive and illuminates the water with a combination of vibrant colors designed to create a magical effect.

Experience the mind blowing and stress relieving powers of this rainbow light up goo. This super elastic putty can be stretched, bounced, thrown, pulled and features a special light up molecule that makes this squishy putty shine bright in various colors.

Flaunt your extravagant wealth as you blow your nose using the hundred dollar bill tissues. These soft, quality napkins feature a realistic hundred dollar bill design so you can convincingly create the illusion you’re literally throwing away money like paper.

Keep possessions organized and protected by storing them inside the clear acrylic trunk. While this stylish and durable trunk won’t do much in the way of keeping its contents private, the acrylic property will allow you to spot items you’re searching for with ease.

Learn the ins and outs of the Empire’s ultimate weapon by studying its complex design using the Death Star owner’s manual. Now, if the fate of the galaxy were to ever fall on your hands you’d be able to prevent it from being destroyed by Rebel scum.

Show your fellow drivers how much you value their input with the “How’s My Driving” car sticker. This amusing decal provides your fellow motorists with a helpful phone number they can contact should they have an issue with the way you drive.

Destroy every insect that dares trudge into your home with ruthless efficiency using the bug vacuum. This portable vacuum goes above and beyond traditional fly swatters by allowing you to suck up virtually any creepy crawler with the simple pull of the trigger.

Transition your pool party seamlessly from day to night by keeping the celebration going with the underwater light show. These specialized lights rotate underwater in order to create mind blowing lighting effects that make your pool look like a fancy night club dance floor.

Take your Landspeeder from the arid climates of Tatooine to the lush setting of your pool as you relax in the Landspeeder inflatable float. Once the three separate air chambers are inflated, the Landspeeder takes form and provides a sizable place for relaxing in.
